items.sentence: I\'m quite certain Tom didn\'t do that on purpose.
I\'m sorry to interrupt you while you\'re talking.
I\'m sorry, Tom. I don\'t approve of your methods.
I\'m sorry. I didn\'t realize it was that serious.
I was at a party with some friends when I met Tom.
I was caught in a shower on my way home yesterday.
I was hoping Tom knew what we were supposed to do.
I was just about to go to bed when the phone rang.
She told him that she had seen me there last week.
She wrote to him to tell him how wonderful he was.
Short-term thinking can create long-term problems.
Sleep deprivation increases risk of heart attacks.
It wasn\'t necessary for him to bring an umbrella.
Tom can\'t seem to understand what you\'re saying.
Is there somewhere in Europe you\'d like to visit?
Is this the first time you\'ve applied for a loan?
Is this the first time you\'ve flown a helicopter?
Let\'s leave now before anyone changes their mind.
Tom didn\'t notice that Mary wasn\'t at the party.
Tom didn\'t remember where he\'d put his passport.
